sentence.Network_en: Today, prescriptive jurisdiction ( capacity to make law ) can be based on nationality and exercised extra - territorially.

sentence.Network_en: As the seemingly endless ages passed , the night elves'civilization expanded both territorially and culturally.
sentence.Network_cn: 很久很久之后, 暗夜精灵的文明无论在疆域还是文化方面都有了巨大的进步.
